TopicTitle: what version of ksp did you buy?

Articles.Content: I bought 0.16
.13, I think? $7
0.18, bought it just as that version was released

0.15.2

$11 - $13? what a steal! I would've gladly shelled out $60
.18.3 is the version I bought. It was around 25 dollars. but I did play the .13.3 free demo for a long bit of time.

I got 0.14 just before 0.15 came out... it was epic.

If anyone has .14 could you PM me and mabye send it to me, it was PERFECT! it was like the demo, but it SAVED!

I joined right around 0.11 when JordanCox2 released his awesome Industrial Flames and Explosions pack.

Speaking of which, my first post was in that thread!

Also, does anyone still have IFE laying around somewhere? I loved that pack and I want to update it for 0.20 (for myself, as the author requested that nobody rerelease it on a forum thread).
It was either 0.8 or 0.9, but not sure.
0.16, but 0.17 came out about a week after, so I thought the releases would be a lot more frequent at first.
the day it hit steam, though I'm not sure what version it was offhand, I think .19
The .18.2 Christmas Sale here! But I played the .13.3 since August that year.
0.11? 0.12 maybe? I think I paid 8 bucks
.14 here!
.16 just after it came out.
Like .18.4 I think, $23, then right after the demo was updated XD
0.14, I heard they finally implemented persistence and just had to have it. Still couldn't orbit at that time I don't think.
Its been awhile. I think it was .15 I finally jumped on buying it.
I bought 0.13, since that was the first buyable version.
I started playing around 0.8 or 0.9 ish, but once the paid version came out I kind of stopped playing for some reason. I only recently bought it around 0.18 or so.

Version 15 I think... been a while and didn't really pay attention to what I paid. Played 13 for a whole hour and a half before grabbing a copy.

Other than the Mods delay after every update been having a blast all the way.

Alacrity Fitz
